all.title: App version outdated
all.message: Please update to the latest version of the SODA.

win32.title: Welcome to version 6.1.0!
win32.message:
New features have been added!
  • You can now import hidden files to your dataset (.DS_Store files are not accepted).
  • README.txt is now a mandatory metadata file for all datasets.
  • The login prompts have been updated to look more appealing.
